DESCRIPTION: After a player or monster attacks, all creatures with #yTargeting take #b2 damage.
Target receives b20% more damage for each stack of Blindsided (up to a maximum of #b3.)
Whenever this creature attacks, it loses #b1 HP and the total amount of #yBleeding is reduced by #b1.
ALL enemies become #yStunned. Fades away after an attack is played.
If you have played 4 cards or more this turn, trigger an additional effect.
Simulate playing cards, for use with #ySwift effects.
Applies a debuff which has no effect.
